ja.question: 画像中の社員が所属する部署数に関する正しい説明はどれですか？
choice: 社員は1つの部署に所属する
社員は1つ以上の部署に所属する
社員が所属する部署数に関しては明記されていない
社員は0個以上の部署に所属する

en.question: Which of the following is the correct explanation regarding the number of departments an employee belongs to in the image?
choice: The employee belongs to one department
The employee belongs to more than one department
There is no statement regarding the number of departments to which the employee belongs
The employee belongs to more than zero departments

ko.question: 이미지에서 직원이 속한 부서 수에 관한 올바른 설명은 다음 중 어느 것인가?
choice: 직원이 속한 부서 수에 대한 명시 없음
